Reviews: This is a straight up bar bar with 2 billiard tables, so it's not a chill and kick it type of vibe. It's a low key sports bar nothing more nothing less. I was expecting just that and got what I was expecting. The only thing though is that it's cash only but other then that it's legit to sit down and drink a lil bit before the next bar hop.
Relevant Content: ambience = "This is a straight up bar bar with 2 billiard tables, so it's not a chill and kick it type of vibe. It's a low key sports bar nothing more nothing less."
Replies: * Describes the establishment as a straightforward bar with billiard tables * States that the environment is not relaxed * Characterizes the bar as a low-key sports bar with no additional amenities or features

Reviews: First time coming here and i enjoyed it. They have good amount of tables, live music, and just a nice place to have some fun at. It can get a little hot though.
Relevant Content: ambience = "They have good amount of tables, live music, and just a nice place to have some fun at. It can get a little hot though."
Replies: * Good amount of tables and live music * Nice place to have some fun * Can get a little hot

Reviews: Service was great!! Within five minutes of sitting down 3 servers asked if we we needed anything!! Live Banda and great beer!!

Guys if your planning to take a date out to a bar, this is so not the place. This is more of a guys who just got out from work and want a couple of beers type of bar. Ladies, Ive been here once with my girls and it was a big no no, weird guys hitting you up, all up in your face. One time this guy gave my cousin a paleta de payaso, wtf lol. I decided to give it another try with my boyfriend and still no good for me. One of the servers was rude, we asked her to bring us a bucket of beers that took her almost 20 minutes for her to bring since she was flirting with a group of guys that were behind us drinking of their own beer. So I turn around and tell her \
My girlfriend wasn't feeling it....  So we left. This place is an after work drinking with the guys spot. If you want to drink with your girl, take her somewhere nicer.
Relevant Content: ambience = ["This place is an after work drinking with the guys spot."
Replies: * Describes the restaurant as a spot for after work drinking with friends. * Mentions ambiance in relation to being a social spot for drinks with friends.

Summary: Based on the reviews, the bar seems to be a straightforward spot with billiard tables, but some reviews noted that the environment is not relaxed and characterized it as a low-key sports bar with no additional amenities or features. On a more positive note, there were reviews mentioning a good amount of tables, live music and that it's a nice place to have fun, but it can get a little hot. Additionally, some reviews mentioned that the restaurant is a spot for after-work drinks with friends and that the ambiance is suited for socializing with friends over drinks. Overall, it seems like the bar is a decent place to go for drinks and socializing, but it may not be the best spot for those looking for a relaxed or upscale environment.
